trends: There have been 128 other sightings in Fort Worth
There were no other sightings in Fort Worth on or around January 2nd 2009
divs: Sighting Detailsnoticed it from my back yard prior to leaving for work. This is not the first instance i have noticed this same display. I live between three airports....I know what a plane looks like....this was NOT A PLANE, OR HELICOPTER. I have no doubt that it is supposed to be written off as a star, but at the time of day( daybreak )......this is FAR TO BRIGHT. On my way to work......GONE.
Summary: Stationary - far brighter than star - flash with red light circling flash.
